TEXT.TITLE: DENSE-PAC MICROSYSTMS <DPAC.O> NAMES CEO
TEXT.BODY: Dense-Pac Microsystems Inc said it named James Turner is chief executive officer. He replaces Anthony Macedo, who was acting on an interim basis and remains a director. Turner had been president of Titan Severe Environment Systems Co. Reuter
